              [" while "],

              [" dispense a 10 coin and set "],
              ["D = D - 10", [["c"]]],

          "parent_id": "d38df2cf-5560-4dc4-a8a7-eefcdba6d5a1",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["Let "],
              ["M", [["c"]]],
              [" in "],
              ["[1,50]", [["c"]]],
              [" be the price for the ticket "],
              ["T", [["c"]]],
              [" and "],
              ["P", [["c"]]],
              [" in "],
              ["[1,50]", [["c"]]],
              [" the money somebody paid for "],
              ["T", [["c"]]],
              [", with "],
              ["P >= M", [["c"]]],
              [". Let "],
              ["D=P-M", [["c"]]],
              [". We define the "],
              ["benefit", [["b"]]],
              [" of a step as the difference between "],
              ["D", [["c"]]],
              [" and "],
              ["D-c", [["c"]]],
              [" with "],
              ["c", [["c"]]],
              [" the coin the automat dispense in this step."]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }

          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["Let "],
              ["C", [["c"]]],
              [
                " be the biggest coin value. The runtime is only polynomial as long as "
              ],
              ["D/C", [["c"]]],
              [" is polynomial, because the representation of "],
              ["D", [["c"]]],
              [" uses only "],
              ["log D", [["c"]]],
              [" bits and the runtime is at least linear in "],
              ["D/C", [["c"]]],
              ["."]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",

          "version": 1

                "In every step our algorithm chooses the local optimum. But this is not sufficient to say that the algorithm finds the global optimal solution (see more informations "
              ],
              ["here", [["a", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matroid"]]],
              [" or in the Book of "],

      "f7ec7e0b-ef29-45fe-a1bc-181be77334bf": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1551929270771,
          "id": "f7ec7e0b-ef29-45fe-a1bc-181be77334bf",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1551929270771,
          "parent_id": "d38df2cf-5560-4dc4-a8a7-eefcdba6d5a1",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "#include <iostream>\n#include <vector>\n#include <string>\n#include <algorithm>\n\nusing namespace std;\n\n// read some coin values, sort them descending,\n// purge copies and guaratee the 1 coin is in it\nstd::vector<unsigned int> readInCoinValues();\n\nint main()\n{\n    std::vector<unsigned int> coinValues;   // Array of coin values ascending    \n    int ticketPrice;                        // M in example\n    int paidMoney;                          // P in example\n\n    // generate coin values\n    coinValues = readInCoinValues();\n    \n    cout << \"ticket price: \";\n    cin >> ticketPrice;\n    \n    cout << \"money paid: \";\n    cin >> paidMoney;\n    \n    if(paidMoney <= ticketPrice)\n    {\n        cout << \"No exchange money\" << endl;\n        return 1;\n    }\n    \n    int diffValue = paidMoney - ticketPrice;\n    \n    // Here starts greedy\n\n    // we save how many coins we have to give out\n    std::vector<unsigned int> coinCount;\n    \n    for(auto coinValue  = coinValues.begin();\n             coinValue != coinValues.end(); ++coinValue)\n    {\n        int countCoins = 0;\n        \n        while (diffValue >= *coinValue)\n        {\n            diffValue -= *coinValue;\n            countCoins++;\n        }\n        \n        coinCount.push_back(countCoins);\n    }\n    \n    // print out result\n    cout << \"the difference \" << paidMoney - ticketPrice \n         << \" is paid with: \" << endl;\n    \n    for(unsigned int i=0; i < coinValues.size(); ++i)\n    {\n        if(coinCount[i] > 0)\n            cout << coinCount[i] << \" coins with value \" \n                 << coinValues[i] << endl;\n    }\n    \n    return 0;\n}\n\nstd::vector<unsigned int> readInCoinValues()\n{\n    // coin values\n    std::vector<unsigned int> coinValues;\n    \n    // make sure 1 is in vectore\n    coinValues.push_back(1);\n\n    // read in coin values (attention: error handling is omitted)\n    while(true)\n    {\n        int coinValue;\n        \n        cout << \"Coin value (<1 to stop): \";\n        cin >> coinValue;\n        \n        if(coinValue > 0)\n            coinValues.push_back(coinValue);\n        \n        else\n            break;\n    }\n    \n    // sort values\n    sort(coinValues.begin(), coinValues.end(), std::greater<int>());\n    \n    // erase copies of same value\n    auto last = std::unique(coinValues.begin(), coinValues.end());\n    coinValues.erase(last, coinValues.end());\n    \n    // print array\n    cout << \"Coin values: \";\n    \n    for(auto i : coinValues)\n        cout << i << \" \";\n    \n    cout << endl;\n    \n    return coinValues;\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      }
    },
    "space": {}
  }
}
